short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhanced text readability through font-weights and brightness adjustment.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TorpedoRead's innovative method facilitates the eye's journey through text by guiding it with artificial fixation points that force focus only on initial letters as opposed to holistic readings. This removes eye relocation and encourages deeper comprehension than shallow forms of media usually allow.
